description: This is a source code file defining API routes for user authentication (registration and login) in a FastAPI application, including route handlers, dependencies, and interactions with database utilities and schemas.

classes.name: UserCreate
classes.description: Pydantic model for user registration input data.

classes.name: UserLogin
classes.description: Pydantic model for user login credentials.

classes.name: UserOut
classes.description: Pydantic model for user profile output data.

classes.name: TokenResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for token response structure.

methods.name: dict register(data: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles user registration, creates user, authenticates immediately to generate token, and returns token with profile.

methods.name: dict login(credentials: UserLogin, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns access token with user profile.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(credentials: UserLogin, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> dict:$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(data: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> dict:$/
